ygData.subject: Re: Practicing Wind with Mino Horn
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Marching I like that, I will use it. *laughs* However, I doubt anyone in MY group is going to buy a descriptive word of the animation that isn t
ygData.messageBody:
> Yes, it does. I use the mino horn exclusively for all the wind songs I
> have, because I hate that silly marching animation you get with the flute.
> My wind skill is maxed for my level.

"Marching" I like that, I will use it. *laughs* However, I doubt anyone in
MY group is going to buy a descriptive word of the animation that isn't
"prancing" or "frolicking like a little wood elf" *sigh* which, BEING a
little wood elf, is a hard one to dispute. at least there is inviso. How
humiliating for a rough and tumble, macho battle bard like Tszaaz who taunts
Cinder Goblin Wizards back to the waiting tanks and endures all they can
throw at him...

*sigh*
*prance*

Tszaaz E'Taurguin
